The photograph was not taken in the Unit: 2. The photograph was taken at the Ghulzar-e-Madina mosque in Zwolle, the Netherlands, during a field trip as part of the "other cultures" project.
Students from OBS Vinkenbuurt visited th: where they learned about Islam and even tried to say the Arabic alphabet.
A similar claim circulated in May 2019: this time involving a video showing children praying to Allah at an American school, but the video was also not recent and did not take place in an American school. It showed Flemish children during a visit to a mosque.
